item.title: Block #791985
item.description: Hello, bitcoiner! Today, 13 years ago, the first purchase of a physical product for bitcoin was made - Laszlo Heiniz exchanged 10,000 bitcoins for two pizzas. And while many today are perplexed as to how it was possible to spend such an incredible amount of bitcoins for lunch, the more interesting question is: how was it possible to part with two perfectly good pizzas in exchange for some magical internet money?
